A Day To Remember
Fun. I think with all the atrocities and seriousness in the music industry these days with band feuds and band civil wars there arenÃƒÂ¢??t many bands around that seem like they are in it for the fun. This is the first release/band in awhile that IÃƒÂ¢??ve come to terms with that I feel like the band is having fun with what they do and these guys in this band feel like they grew up as a kid who loved music just like any of us. I could throw out formulas and genre bull*** that probably the first thing that comes to anyoneÃƒÂ¢??s mind but who invented the rules anyway? A Day To Remember is a band much like Set Your Goals which has the furious, fast, fun, influences of modern day pop-punk and combines it with crushing breakdowns and hardcore pace screaming/chanting. For all of the music elitists out there, this is simply a nightmare. ItÃƒÂ¢??s just a known thing that a lot of people who like pop-punk and alternative rock isnÃƒÂ¢??t so much for screaming, hardcore vocals (even though times have changed) and itÃƒÂ¢??s most definite then most of the hardcore and metal core kids cant stand the ÃƒÂ¢??whiningÃƒÂ¢?? in pop-punk. ItÃƒÂ¢??s a genre clash, and itÃƒÂ¢??s an interesting mix for a band to bring to the table. Another band thatÃƒÂ¢??s hitting it off big is doing the same thing and a lot of people are in love with them, they are known as Set Your Goals. Already though if youÃƒÂ¢??re a huge Set Your Goals fan you wonÃƒÂ¢??t need to read any longer because this will be your nirvana. For those who are non-believers or just those who are ignorant to the differences in genres, open up your ears to probably the music industries next big cash in.
